title: iHeartRadio Bonus Herd Episode
itunes:title: iHeartRadio Bonus Herd Episode
description:
A bonus Herd episode has just been posted exclusively in iHeartRadio! Enjoy Colin chatting with NBA Champion & 2020 Coach of the Year Nick Nurse from the Raptors.

 

Listen to the conversation by clicking here.

 

In this bonus episode Colin & Nick Nurse discuss what it’s like coaching one of the most enigmatic stars the NBA has ever seen, Nurse’s relationship with Phil Jackson, and his vast coaching travels. 

 

This bonus interview is available exclusively in the iHeartRadio app. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
